title: RDP doesn't respect desktop scaling
author: luisarnauth
body_snippet:
After upgrading to 1.77.0.41307 the RDP connections don't respect the desktop scaling , showing the remote desktop in 100% scaling.

Prior to this upgrade, the remote desktop connections inherit the desktop scaling.

comments.author: tonibony
comments.snippet: A workaround for this issue on Windows 10: Find `mRemoteNG.exe` file, open "Properties" -> "Compatibility" -> "Change high DPI settings" -> "High DPI scaling override", turn on "Override high DPI scaling behavior" option and set "Scaling performed by:" to "System" or "System (Enhanced)", not "Application".
